thread.title: How Fatherhood Is Inspiring Thomas Rhett: Two Kids on the Way ‘Is Already Starting to Creep Into My Songwriting’
thread.title_full: How Fatherhood Is Inspiring Thomas Rhett: Two Kids on the Way ‘Is Already Starting to Creep Into My Songwriting’

author: Eileen Finan
title: How Fatherhood Is Inspiring Thomas Rhett: Two Kids on the Way ‘Is Already Starting to Creep Into My Songwriting’
text:
A post shared by ThomasRhettAkins (@thomasrhettakins) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:20am PST 
As he gets to know his kids, Thomas Rhett says, “I can definitely see a lot of their personalities showing up in [my] music.” 
The singer, who shared the news this week that his wife is pregnant and that the couple are adopting a child from Africa, says he’s doing everything he can to prepare for fatherhood as a touring artist. 
“I’m just trying to collect as much advice as possible,” he admits. “We have a ton of friends that we’re close with that have adopted children and we have friends like Luke Bryan and Dierks Bentley who are on the road just as much as we are and they have children, and so obviously it is doable.” A post shared by Lauren Akins (@laur_akins) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:32pm PST 
RELATED VIDEO: Thomas Rhett and Wife Lauren Expecting a Baby – and Adopting a Child from Africa 
The couple is hoping to welcome home their child from Africa soon — “It could not happen fast enough!” says Lauren — and their daughter is due in early August. 
But in the meantime, “We want to get that last little bit of just me and her time ,” says Thomas Rhett. “We’re just trying to soak it in and have as much fun, us two, as possible.” Show Full Article
